articles.description: Ruthless England thump Scotland in their final Women's Nations League group match but their hopes of helping Team GB qualify for the Paris 2024 Olympics are over.
articles.title: England thump Scotland but GB Olympic dream over

articles.description: In 1951, a celebratory trophy parade is said to have crossed paths with a funeral procession. Whether true or not, their meeting hangs over Mayo's Gaelic football team.
articles.title: Cursed? The story of the 72-year-old hex that haunts Mayo

articles.description: Declan Rice's last-gasp header gives Arsenal victory in a seven-goal thriller at Luton to move them five points clear at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Rice snatches Arsenal win in seven-goal Luton thriller

articles.description: Hwang Hee-chan scores a first-half winner as Wolves edge past relegation-threatened Burnley at Molineux.
articles.title: Hwang scores winner as Wolves edge past Burnley

articles.description: Olympic sports federations ask the International Olympic Committee to allow Russian and Belarusian athletes to compete as neutrals at next summer's Paris Games.
articles.title: IOC asked to let Russians compete as neutrals in Paris

articles.description: Erik ten Hag has urged Manchester United's hierarchy to trust him to return the club to their former glories.
articles.title: 'Ten Hag urges trust amid familiar player unrest claims'

articles.description: Argentina and Inter Miami forward Lionel Messi is named Time magazine's Athlete of the Year.
articles.title: Messi named Time magazine's Athlete of the Year

articles.description: Beth Mead says England are "devastated to miss out by such small margins" after being denied a place in the Women's Nations League finals.
articles.title: 'It really hurts' - England 'devastated' at exit

articles.description: F1 Academy head Susie Wolff rejects allegations of a conflict of interest involving her and husband, Mercedes boss Toto Wolff, in the "strongest possible terms".
articles.title: Susie Wolff rejects conflict of interest allegations

articles.description: The ball that will be used at Euro 2024 in Germany will lead to quicker, more accurate decisions by the video assistant referee, says Uefa.
articles.title: Euro 2024 ball will mean faster VAR decisions - Uefa
